name: Up To Chance
description:
Chance the d6 goes on a quest to seek his fortune, the luck kind!  Play as a bouncing, rolling die in this difficult platformer made in 48 hours for the GMTK2022 Jam.  

Disclaimer: The game can work in browser, but it runs much smoother locally if you're having a tough time.  

Controls:

  • A/D or Arrow Keys: Move side to side
  • W or Up Arrow: Speed up roll
  • S or Down Arrow: Slow down roll
  • Space: Double jump (when ready)
  • Esc: Pause/Resume
  • Mouse required to navigate menus
  • Any key/LMB to skip title cards

Powerups last for the duration of the level, and are reactivated each time the corresponding side is rerolled (land on any surface of any orientation with that side opposite the surface).  To double jump you need to have the blue token, roll blue, then press Space in the air.  To recharge just roll blue again before using the jump.  

There are 4 levels, thanks for playing!
